title: Die Veneris, 24 die Augusti, 1660. The Lords in Parliament taking notice, that the streets, lanes, and other publike passages in or neer the cities of London and Westminster ... are very much out of repair ..
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publicationStmtDate: 1660. At the King's printing-house in Black-Friers.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed for John Bill, printer to the King's most excellent Majesty [At the King's printing-house in Black-Friers],
